name: Scooped Ice Cream & Gelato
description: Small homemade ice cream shop with many flavors and toppings.

reviews.author: A. Reviewer
reviews.comment: This is a small cute homemade ice cream store. They had about 15 flavors and lots of toppings. The strawberry was creamy and full of flavor — highly recommend!

reviews.author: Jordan P.
reviews.comment: Great local place to check out - support local businesses like this one!

reviews.author: Maya S.
reviews.comment: Lovely selection and friendly staff, a bit pricey but worth it for homemade quality.

name: Earth & State
description: Local arts & crafts store emphasizing community makers.

reviews.author: L. Carter
reviews.comment: The owners are the epitome of awesome — hometown small business supporting local artists.

reviews.author: Priya N.
reviews.comment: Great selection and thoughtful curation. Cozy reading corner and friendly staff.

name: Cork and Candles
description: BYOB candle-making classes and creative events.

reviews.author: Olivia K.
reviews.comment: I was excited to get started! Fun BYOB classes and you can order small bites while you create.

reviews.author: Ben R.
reviews.comment: Good experience for groups — well organized and creative.

name: Napoletano Brothers
description: Family-run Italian kitchen known for authentic recipes and sandwiches.

reviews.author: Carla M.
reviews.comment: Amazing authentic Italian food — a real neighborhood gem.

reviews.author: Ethan G.
reviews.comment: They are a business that helps make Springfield great.

reviews.author: Nina S.
reviews.comment: Great sandwiches and friendly staff, will come back for the pasta.

name: Compendium Boutique
description: Curated women's clothing and handmade accessories.

reviews.author: Sophie L.
reviews.comment: What drew me in today was the sandwich board sign — lovely selection and helpful staff.

name: 320 Market Café
description: Cafe serving coffee, cheese, and light fare.

reviews.author: Trey H.
reviews.comment: Probably will come back — there is a lot of potential here and I wish success for this small business.

reviews.author: Megan R.
reviews.comment: Nice spot but a few rough edges. Friendly staff though.

reviews.author: Luis A.
reviews.comment: Good coffee and atmosphere — try the cheese plates.

name: Ennis Auto Tags and Notary
description: Registration services and notary; fast and friendly service.

reviews.author: K. Allen
reviews.comment: Excellent service, friendly, and efficient! Jackie was knowledgeable and very helpful.

name: Sam & Sam Meats
description: Family-owned meat shop and local grocery.

reviews.author: Olga T.
reviews.comment: Family-owned and they really care about quality. Great cuts and friendly service.

reviews.author: Derek P.
reviews.comment: Fresh meats and helpful staff — will be back.

name: Together Skateboarding & Cafe
description: Skate shop combined with a friendly cafe and community space.

reviews.author: R. Thompson
reviews.comment: Lovely little cafe, very friendly small business! Great vibe for skaters and coffee lovers.

name: The Great Frame Up
description: Custom framing and art services by local experts.

reviews.author: Hannah Q.
reviews.comment: Incredibly talented framer — great customer service and attention to detail.

reviews.author: Sam L.
reviews.comment: Excellent work and helpful advice on preservation framing.
